gurmukhi: ਜੋੲੀ ਕੁਲਾ ਧਰਮ ਕਰਮ ਕੈ ਸੁਚਾਰ ਚਾਰ ਸੋੲੀ ਪਰਵਾਰਿ ਬਿਖੈ ਸ੍ਰੇਸਟੁ ਬਖਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Joee Kulaa Dharam Karam Kai Souchaar Chaara , Soee Paravaari Bikhai Sraysatu Bakhaaneeai ?
translation: He who performs all deeds according to his family traditions, behaves well and kindly is known as an ideal person in the family.

gurmukhi: ਬਨਜੁ ਬਿੳੁਹਾਰ ਸਾਚੋ ਸਾਹ ਸਨਮੁਖ ਸਦਾ ਸੋੲੀ ਤੳੁ ਬਨੳੁਟਾ ਨਿਹਕਪਟ ਕੈ ਮਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Banaju Biuhaar Saacho Saah Sanamoukh Sadaa , Soee Tau Banaoutaa Nihakapat Kai Maaneeai ?
translation: He who is honest of all his dealings, alone is considered guileless and sincere before his master, the rich merchant.

gurmukhi: ਸੁਅਾਮ ਕਾਮ ਸਾਵਧਾਨ ਮਾਨਤ ਨਰੇਸ ਅਾਨ ਸੋੲੀ ਸ੍ਵਾਮਿ ਕਾਰਜੀ ਪ੍ਰਸਿਧਿ ਪਹਿਚਾਨੀਅੈ
transliteration: Suaam Kaam Saavadhaan Maanat Narays Aana , Soee Svaami Kaarajee Prasidhi Pahichaaneeai ?
translation: He who acknowledges the authority of his king and performs his master's tasks with care and devotion is always recognised as the ideal servant of the master (king).

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰ ੳੁਪਦੇਸ ਪਰਵੇਸ ਰਿਦਿ ਅੰਤਰਿ ਹੈ ਸਬਦ ਸੁਰਤਿ ਸੋੲੀ ਸਿਖ ਜਗ ਜਾਨੀਅੈ ॥੩੮੦॥
transliteration: Gur Oupadays Paravays Ridi Antari Hai , Sabad Surati Soee Sikh Jag Jaaneeai ?380?
translation: Similarly, an obedient Sikh of the Guru who lodges the teachings of True Guru in his mind and engrosses his consciousness in the divine word is known the world over.  (380)
